text:
Not to overcomplicate things, but if you also have that many product pages... there runs the risk of duplication based on the category URL system. (Image for example) You may want to, if needed, look at Canonical URL Tags. (unless you already are, then disregard)

Sources:
• <https://moz.com/blog/canonical-url-tag-the-most-important-advancement-in-seo-practices-since-sitemaps|Rand Fishkin/moz.com> - Canonical URL Tag - The Most Important Advancement in SEO Practices Since Sitemaps.
• <https://www.bruceclay.com/blog/how-to-use-canonical-link-element-duplicate-content/|bruceclay.com> - *How To Use the Canonical Link Element for Duplicate Content*
